title: Pecan and Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: ['1 (23cm) shortcrust pastry case', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '250g pumpkin puree', '3 eggs, beaten', '175g golden syrup', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '90g chopped pecans', '110g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '175ml whipping cream', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract']
